[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||39px|||” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#879eab” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”9px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth Investigations International has been serving individuals and corporations in Indianapolis Indiana, and nationwide for over 30 years. We look forward to offering new clientele assistance and solutions for their investigative needs. Whether you’re an individual, small or large company, Lauth Investigations International can help with a network of highly qualified Indiana private investigators and partner investigators throughout the United States.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”9px|||||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Whether you’re an individual, business, or lawyer, Lauth Investigations International can help with a network of highly qualified Indiana private investigators and partner investigators throughout the United States. To assist you, please select from the Individual, Business or Lawyer buttons above to complete the contact form.

excerpt.rendered: Contact Us Contact us today for a free consultation and learn how Lauth Investigations International can provide you with a solution to your personal or corporate crisis.Toll-Free: 800-889-FIND Phone: 317-951-1100Contact us personally: hirelauth@lauthinvestigations.com201 North Illinois Street, 16th Floor South Tower Indianapolis, IN 46204Lauth Investigations International has been serving individuals and corporations in Indianapolis Indiana, and nationwide […]

meta._et_pb_old_content: Lauth Investigations International has been serving individuals and corporations in Indianapolis Indiana, and nationwide for over 30 years. We look forward to offering new clientele assistance and solutions for their investigative needs. Whether you’re an individual, small or large company, Lauth Investigations International can help with a network of highly qualified Indiana private investigators and partner investigators throughout the United States. Contact us today for a free consultation and learn how Lauth Investigations International can provide you with a solution to your personal or corporate crisis today. [gravityform id="1" title="true" description="true"]
